name: Verify uploading a worker who can just work in the UK
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the UK
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it and it uploads successfully
justification: Tests a critical business process (worker upload), involves data manipulation, and covers integration points.

name: Verify uploading a worker who can work in Ireland only
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the Ireland
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it and it uploads successfully
justification: Tests a critical business process (worker upload), involves data manipulation, and covers integration points.

name: Verify uploading a worker who can work in both the UK and Ireland
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the Ireland and the uk. 
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it and it uploads successfully
justification: Tests a critical business process (worker upload), covers multiple integrated components, and involves data manipulation.

name: Verify that a neuven user cant upload a worker who works in the UK without an NI number
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the UK – apart form the NI number 
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it, and they are given and error message relating to the lack of NI number .
justification: Tests a critical business process with validation, involves data manipulation, has security implications, and covers integration points.

name: Verify the changes to the worker upload screen DBW for NEUVEN USERS
testScript:
Given

  • Logged in as a Neuven user with Manage Direct Bank Worker Permission 

When 

  • On the Direct Worker Page > Click Upload Worker 

Then

  • A popup will appear
  • The popup will have 2 tabs
  • The worker upload tab and the worker roll back tab. 
  • On the WORKER UPLOAD TAB
    1. Enable users to upload file from their PC. 
    2. Template download button 
    3. ‘upload’ button. 
  • On the WORKER ROLL BACK TAB. 
    1. Enter batch Id text box 
    2. If batch id is valid, it will remove all uploaded direct bank worker details 
    3. If the batch ID in not valid error message will appear stating: ‘Enter Valid Batch ID’
justification: Tests a critical business process (upload screen changes), involves multiple steps and integration points, covers user permissions.

name: Verify the changes to the worker upload screen DBW for CLIENT USERS
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a Client User with Edit Direct Bank Worker Permission
When 
  • On the Direct Worker Page > Click Upload Worker 
Then
  • A popup will appear
  • The popup will have 2 tabs
  • The worker upload tab and the worker roll back tab. 
  • On the WORKER UPLOAD TAB
    • Enable users to upload file from their PC. 
    • Template download button 
    • ‘upload’ button. 
  • On the WORKER ROLL BACK TAB. 
    • Enter batch Id text box 
    • If batch id is valid, it will remove all uploaded direct bank worker details 
    • If the batch ID in not valid error message will appear stating: ‘Enter Valid Batch ID’
justification: Tests a critical business process (upload screen changes), involves multiple steps and integration points, covers user permissions.

name: Verify the changes to T&A manual entry when selecting a client who is set up for both DBW Only
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    1. Direct Bank worker name - Direct Bank worker - approved - linked to the client location 
    2. When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way
justification: Tests a critical business process, covers multiple integrated components, involves data manipulation.

name: Verify the changes to T&A manual entry when selecting a client who is set up for agency workers only
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    • Agency worker name - Agency branch name (Existing functionality)
    • When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way
justification: Tests a critical business process, covers multiple integrated components, involves data manipulation.

name: Verify the changes to T&A manual entry when selecting a client who is set up for both DBW and agency workers.
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as client user with T&A user permission 
When 
  • On the T&A board
  • Selecting ‘New Time Attendance’
  • The select client location pop up box will appear on screen 
Then
  • Worker dropdown will show both agency workers and DBW’s in below format
    1. Agency worker name - Agency branch name (Existing functionality)
    2. Direct Bank worker name - Direct Bank worker - approved - linked to the client location 
    3. When logged in from Tab using T&A QR code scanning function, when manual entry is chosen, the worker dropdown should function the same way
justification: Tests a critical business process, covers multiple integrated components, involves data manipulation, includes validation of worker type.

name: Verify a NEUVEN USER can view the QR code Button on a direct workers profile.
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Neuven user with ‘Manage Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When
  • Direct Bank worker page
  • View a Direct Bank worker details
  • In the user details tab
Then
  • There is a ‘View QR Code’ button on the top right of the screen 
  • When clicked it displays a QR Code for that worker.
justification: Tests a UI element (QR code button), involves user permissions, but has lower business impact.

name: Verify a CLIENT USER can view the QR code Button on a direct worker's profile.
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Client user with ‘'View Direct Bank Worker’' or '‘Edit Direct Bank Worker’ permission
When 
  • Direct Bank worker page
  • View a Direct Bank worker details
  • In the user details tab

Then
  • There is a ‘View QR Code’ button on the top right of the screen 
  • When clicked it displays a QR Code for that worker. 
 
UNO-2473
justification: Tests a UI element (QR code button), involves user permissions, but has lower business impact.

name: Verify that if the client location has ‘Direct Bank Workers Only’ or ‘Both’ toggle on the client setting, no change is made to the T&A board page
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a Client User (With T&A permission)
  • T&A
  • T&A Board
  • Select Client Location
When 
  • Client location has ‘'Direct Bank Workers Only’' of ‘'Both’' Toggle on in client settings
Then 
Then below labels should be changed
  • The “Agency” column header “Worker Source”
  • The text in the Search box “Search Worker Source”
justification: Tests configuration toggle, involves data manipulation, but has lower business impact.

name: Verify the recognition of a scanned QR Code
testScript:
Given 
  • Client User 
When 
  • The QR code is scanned   by a worker to  either clock in or clock out. 
Then
The worker source column should:
  • Show source as Direct Bank worker if it is DBW and name of the DBW in Worker column
  • show source as ‘'Agency Branch Name’' if it is a Agency worker
justification: Tests critical functionality (QR code scanning), covers security-related functions, involves data manipulation, covers integration points.

name: Verify that if the client location has ‘Agency Worker Only’ toggle on the client setting, no change is made to the T&A board page
testScript:
Given 
  • Logged in as a Client User (With T&A permission)
  • T&A
  • T&A Board
  • Select Client Location
When 
  • Client location has ‘'Agency Worker Only’' Toggle on in the client settings
Then
  • There will be no changes to the existing page
justification: Tests configuration toggle, involves data manipulation, but has lower business impact.

name: Verify that as a Direct Bank Worker the same QR code is displayed in the app as on the website
testScript:
Given 
  • A Direct Bank Worker is set up in Venneu.com
  • There is a QR code for that Direct Bank Worker 
  • The Direct Bank Worker has registered in Venneu APP
When 
  • In the worker profile section
  • And the upcoming shift details section 
Then
  • Show the same QR code of that worker
justification: Tests UI consistency, involves data display, but has lower business impact.

name: Verify that when a QR code has been scanned in it updates to the T&A board for a client user.
testScript:
Given 
  • A Direct Bank Worker is set up in Venneu.com
  • There is a QR code for that Direct Bank Worker 
  • The Direct Bank Worker has registered in Venneu APP
When
  • The QR code is scanned to clock in and out for a shift via tablet
Then
  • Should work the same way it Workers for a Agency worker - except the worker source will be Direct Bank worker
  • These details will show in the T&A board for Client user or Neuven user (With T&A permission) for the locations they are linked to in the T&A Page along side of agency workers if the location question users ‘'both’' types of workers.
justification: Tests critical functionality (QR code scanning with T&A update), involves multiple components, covers security-related functions, involves data manipulation.

name: Verify that a neuven user can’t upload a worker who works in the UK without an NI number and without stating UK in the document
testScript:
Given
  • Logged in as a neuven user with Manage Agencies permission
When
  • User has downloaded and completed the template 
  • They fill it in will all the information compulsory for a worker to work in the UK – apart form the NI number 
Then
  • Agency > Agency Worker
  • Click Upload Worker
  • They upload it, and they are given and error message relating to the lack of NI number and UK.
justification: Tests critical validation (worker upload with missing data), involves security implications, covers multiple components, involves data manipulation.
